1.name: Text for subsequent use
1.desc: The occurrence of this text does not affect message processing.

2.name: Text replacing missing code
2.desc:
Text description of a coded data item for which there is no currently
                                    available code.

3.name: Text for immediate use
3.desc: Text must be read before actioning message.

4.name: No action required
4.desc: Pass text on to later recipient.

5.name: Header
5.desc: Indicates that the text is to be taken as a header.

6.name: Numbered paragraph
6.desc: Indicates that the text starts a new numbered paragraph.

7.name: Paragraph
7.desc: Indicates that the text is a paragraph.
